title: Permanently Banned
body:
Soo.. I got permanently banned for flaming? I'm pretty sure normally you get a 14 day warning before this happens as a warning to try prevent you from flaming again. I didn't think I would permanently as I'm normally not flaming as much as I did in that one game. If there is any way I could get unbanned that would be the best thing.
:)
Thank you for your help
-Focus n Succeed

replies.body:
It might not be the fact that you only flamed once or that you don't do it often, but rather the fact that the words that you used are held at a higher level of toxicity and therefore the punishment inflicted would be more severe. 

An example of this would be hate speech.
Clearly you do it too often, because they do give warnings
Only other thing i can think of is that you havnt really given all the pertinent information
